name: flash-md-whatsapp-bot
description: A WhatsApp bot powered by Baileys.

SESSION.description: Flash MD session string (required for WhatsApp login)

YOUR_NUMBER.description: Your WhatsApp number in international format (e.g. 254742063632)

WARNINGS.description: Number of warnings before action is taken

YOUR_NAME.description: Your name or bot owner name

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Enable auto view of status updates (on/off)

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku API key (for automatic restart or deploy)

PRESENCE_DM.description: Bot presence status in DMs (typing, online, recording, paused, offline)

PRESENCE_GROUP.description: Bot presence status in groups (typing, online, recording, paused, offline)
